parameter.name: Compute
parameter.comment: Compute VO?.

parameter.name: Compute
parameter.comment: Perform the scaling?.

parameter.name: Central point offset
parameter.comment: Camera central point offset [px]

parameter.name: FOV scale factor
parameter.comment: Scale factor to apply to the fov for the left and right images.

parameter.name: Scale Horizontally Only
parameter.comment: Resize image only in horizontal direction

parameter.name: Resize to orig size
parameter.comment: Resize image to original size if fov scale factor <> 1

parameter.name: Crop Top-left
parameter.comment: Top-left image coordinates to define crop area. [px]

parameter.name: Crop Bottom-right
parameter.comment: Bottom-right image coordinates to define crop area. [px]

parameter.name: Register Drawing Lists
parameter.comment: Register the drawing lists as output of the operator so that other operators can reuse the texture information

parameter.name: Image 0
parameter.comment: Image 0

parameter.name: Image 1
parameter.comment: Image 1

parameter.name: Left Image Id
parameter.comment: String Id of left image.

parameter.name: Output Feature Vector Id
parameter.comment: Id of feature point vector.

parameter.name: Compute
parameter.comment: Compute SURF features on the input image?.

parameter.name: Correlation
parameter.comment: Use correlation instead of freak.

parameter.name: Normalized Correlation
parameter.comment: Normalized patches for correlation.

parameter.name: Maximum Number of Features
parameter.comment: Maximum Number of Features to ouptut.

parameter.name: Max Features Per Tile
parameter.comment: Maximum Number of Features per tile.

parameter.name: Squared max distance
parameter.comment: Squared max distance between key points

parameter.name: Squared max distance 4 Pred
parameter.comment: Squared max distance between key points for predicted points

parameter.name: Apply SPE after GFTT
parameter.comment: Use Sub Pixel Estimation after GoodFeaturesToTrack

parameter.name: OpenCV Sub Pixel Estimation Block Size
parameter.comment: Block Size parameter of OpenCV cornerSubPix

parameter.name: SPE Max Iterations
parameter.comment: Maximum number of iterations for Sub Pixel Estimation

parameter.name: OpenCV Sub Pixel Estimation EPS
parameter.comment: Epsilon to stop estimation

parameter.name: GFTT quality level
parameter.comment: quality level parameter of OpenCV GoodFeaturesToTrack

parameter.name: GFTT quality factor
parameter.comment: Factor to multiply the patch std dev [1/luminance]

parameter.name: GFTT Min Distance
parameter.comment: Min Distance parameter of OpenCV GoodFeaturesToTrack

parameter.name: GFTT Block Size
parameter.comment: Block Size parameter of OpenCV GoodFeaturesToTrack

parameter.name: GFTT Use Harris
parameter.comment: Use Harris corner for OpenCV GoodFeaturesToTrack

parameter.name: Max Descriptor Distance
parameter.comment: Max distance between two descriptors

parameter.name: Keypoints
parameter.comment: Keypoints

parameter.name: Matches
parameter.comment: Matches

parameter.name: Vector Length Color Mode
parameter.comment: Color encoding for the optical vector length.

parameter.name: Vector Length Range
parameter.comment: Color encoding for the optical vector length.

parameter.name: Left Image Id
parameter.comment: String Id of left image.

parameter.name: Output Feature Vector Id
parameter.comment: Id of feature point vector.

parameter.name: Pre-Filter?
parameter.comment: Apply mask normalization to input image.

parameter.name: Compute
parameter.comment: Compute SURF features on the input image?.

parameter.name: Maximum Number of Features
parameter.comment: Maximum Number of Features to ouptut.

parameter.name: KLT Pyramid levels
parameter.comment: Pyramid levels for klt tracker.

parameter.name: Check Collissions
parameter.comment: Check for feature collissions.

parameter.name: Sq. collision distance
parameter.comment: Squared distance between two tracked features to detect collision [px].

parameter.name: Kernel Size
parameter.comment: Kernel size parameter for KLT tracking

parameter.name: Use Prediction
parameter.comment: Use prediction from ego-motion to estimate future feature position

parameter.name: Min Feature Distance
parameter.comment: Min distance between detected features.

parameter.name: Min Eigenvalue
parameter.comment: Min eigenvalue to consider for detection.

parameter.name: Apply SPE after GFTT
parameter.comment: Use Sub Pixel Estimation after GoodFeaturesToTrack

parameter.name: SPE Block Size
parameter.comment: Block Size parameter of OpenCV cornerSubPix

parameter.name: SPE Max Iterations
parameter.comment: Maximum number of iterations for Sub Pixel Estimation

parameter.name: SPE epsilon
parameter.comment: Epsilon to stop estimation

parameter.name: Previous Image
parameter.comment: Previous Image

parameter.name: Current Image
parameter.comment: Current Image

parameter.name: Keypoints
parameter.comment: Keypoints

parameter.name: Matches
parameter.comment: Matches

parameter.name: Vector Length Color Mode
parameter.comment: Color encoding for the optical vector length.

parameter.name: Vector Length Range
parameter.comment: Color encoding for the optical vector length.

parameter.name: Pre-Filter Mask Size
parameter.comment: Mask size for box-filter normalization [px]

parameter.name: Pre-Filter Clamp Scale
parameter.comment: Pre-filter clamp scale

parameter.name: Feature Mask
parameter.comment: Feature Mask

parameter.name: Adaptive Distance
parameter.comment: Min distance between detected features.

parameter.name: Detect GFTT
parameter.comment: If true, detects thresholding min eigenvalue. Otherwise Harris.

parameter.name: Harris K
parameter.comment: K parameter value for Harris corner detector.

parameter.name: Min Harris Response
parameter.comment: Min Harris response to sort values.

parameter.name: Pyr LK Epsilon
parameter.comment: Epsilon for iterative LK algorithm

parameter.name: Pyr LK Max Count
parameter.comment: Max number of iteratinos for LK algorithm

parameter.name: Input Feature Vector Id
parameter.comment: Id of feature point vector. Must be a CFeatureVector type.

parameter.name: Left Image Id
parameter.comment: Id of left image.

parameter.name: Right Image Id
parameter.comment: Id of right image.

parameter.name: Compute
parameter.comment: Compute Feature Stereo?

parameter.name: Pre-Filter?
parameter.comment: Apply mask normalization to input images.

parameter.name: Disparity Range
parameter.comment: Color encoding for the disparity features

parameter.name: Pyramid Levels
parameter.comment: 0 is the first level (original size)

parameter.name: Disparity correction
parameter.comment: +- correction in pyramid transfer [px].

parameter.name: Mask Size
parameter.comment: Correlation mask size [px].

parameter.name: Check Variances?
parameter.comment: Check the variances of the masks?

parameter.name: Min Variance
parameter.comment: Min allowed variance for left and right windows [luminance^2].

parameter.name: Max ZSSD
parameter.comment: Max allowed zero-mean sum of square difference [luminance^2].

parameter.name: Max SSD
parameter.comment: Max allowed sum of square difference [luminance^2].

parameter.name: Disparity Offset
parameter.comment: Disparity offset [px].

parameter.name: Left Image Features
parameter.comment: Left Image Features

parameter.name: Right Image Features
parameter.comment: Right Image Features

parameter.name: Left Image Pyramid
parameter.comment: Left Image Pyramid

parameter.name: Right Image Pyramid
parameter.comment: Right Image Pyramid

parameter.name: Disparity Color Mode
parameter.comment: Color encoding for the disparity features

parameter.name: Show 3D Points
parameter.comment: Show points in 3D display.

parameter.name: Left Image Id
parameter.comment: Id for left image

parameter.name: Camera Id
parameter.comment: Id for rectified camera

parameter.name: Input Feature Vector Id
parameter.comment: Id of feature point vector. Must be a CFeatureVector type.

parameter.name: Compute
parameter.comment: Compute MonoEgo-motion?

parameter.name: Radial weighting
parameter.comment: Apply radial weighting to give more weight to central pixels?

parameter.name: Squared weighting
parameter.comment: Squared weighting?

parameter.name: Dynamic weighting
parameter.comment: Features are weighted based on the reprojection error of the previous iteration

parameter.name: Enable MFI
parameter.comment: Enable MFI?

parameter.name: History Size
parameter.comment: Number of frames to store tracking history [frames].

parameter.name: Integrate with KF?
parameter.comment: Integrate motion estimates with KF?

parameter.name: System Rotation Variance
parameter.comment: Driving noise: system rotation variance [deg^2].

parameter.name: System Translation Variance
parameter.comment: Driving noise: system translation variance [m^2].

parameter.name: Use Motion Prediction
parameter.comment: Use motion prediction?

parameter.name: Max Robust Iterations
parameter.comment: Maximum number of iterations for optimization.

parameter.name: Max Newton Iterations
parameter.comment: Maximum number of minimization iterations.

parameter.name: Force Reevaluation
parameter.comment: At least two iterations of the optimization step is performed.

parameter.name: Initial Sigma Tolerance
parameter.comment: Sigma tolerance to use for initial feature selection [px]

parameter.name: Min Points
parameter.comment: Minimum number of points for optimization. If the number of points falls below this threshold, the optimization iteration stops

parameter.name: Expected Variance
parameter.comment: Max expected variance for. The optimization iteration will stop when a residuum smaller than this is obtained [px^2].

parameter.name: Min Reproj Residual
parameter.comment: Minimum reprojection residual to use for dynamic weighting.

parameter.name: Max Age 4 Weight
parameter.comment: Max age value to use as weight for the weight component [frames].

parameter.name: Max Age 4 Integration
parameter.comment: Max age value to use for integrating features [frames].

parameter.name: Max Innovation 4 Integration
parameter.comment: Max innovation to integrate features [px^2]

parameter.name: Max Avg Innovation
parameter.comment: Max average innovation for integration

parameter.name: Max predictions
parameter.comment: Min prediction to apply rejection test

parameter.name: Min age for test
parameter.comment: Min age to apply rejection test [frames]

parameter.name: Variance Tolerance
parameter.comment: Variance tolerance for outlier rejection [px^2]

parameter.name: Residuum Tolerance
parameter.comment: Optimization iteration stops when the score value of two consecutive iterations is less than this number [px^2].

parameter.name: Scale KF system variance
parameter.comment: System variance for the 1D Kalman scale filtering

parameter.name: Translation Comp Step
parameter.comment: Step for the computation the the translation part of the Hesse Matrix [m].

parameter.name: Rotation Comp Step
parameter.comment: Step for the computation the rotation part of the Hesse Matrix [deg].

parameter.name: Min Disparity
parameter.comment: Min feature disparity to consider for motion estimation

parameter.name: Estimated Feature Motion
parameter.comment: Estimated Feature Motion

parameter.name: Integrated Features
parameter.comment: Integrated Features

parameter.name: Epipolar Lines
parameter.comment: Epipolar Lines

parameter.name: Error Color Encoding Color Mode
parameter.comment: Color encoding for the error between predicted and measured reprojection [px].

parameter.name: Error Color Encoding Range
parameter.comment: Color encoding for the error between predicted and measured reprojection [px].

parameter.name: Include Disp in Color Enc
parameter.comment: Include the disparity estimate in the error color encoding?

parameter.name: Show Outliers
parameter.comment: Show outliers as circles?

parameter.name: SCI: Overlay Left Image
parameter.comment: SCI: Overlay Left Image

parameter.name: Point Distance
parameter.comment: Point Distance

parameter.name: Ground Homography
parameter.comment: Ground Homography

parameter.name: Motion Homography
parameter.comment: Motion Homography

parameter.name: Ground Translation
parameter.comment: For grund homography computation [m]

parameter.name: Camera Rotation
parameter.comment: Camera rotation for ground homography computation [deg]

parameter.name: PrevToCurr
parameter.comment: PrevToCurr

parameter.name: PrevGround
parameter.comment: PrevGround

parameter.name: CurrGround
parameter.comment: CurrGround

parameter.name: Accumulator Image
parameter.comment: Accumulator Image

parameter.name: Scale Plot
parameter.comment: Scale Plot

parameter.name: External Scale
parameter.comment: Scale factor to apply top estimated translation vector.

parameter.name: Road Width
parameter.comment: Road width to consider for scale estimation [m].

parameter.name: Road Length
parameter.comment: Road length to consider for scale estimation [m].

parameter.name: Road Long Pos
parameter.comment: Road longitudinal start position for scale estimation [m]

parameter.name: Accumulator Image Width
parameter.comment: Width of the Hough accumulator image [px]

parameter.name: Accumulator Image Height
parameter.comment: Height of the Hough accumulator image [px]

parameter.name: Accumulator LP Factor
parameter.comment: Low pass filter factor for Hough accumulator

parameter.name: System X Translation Variance
parameter.comment: Driving noise: system translation variance [m^2].

parameter.name: System Y Translation Variance
parameter.comment: Driving noise: system translation variance [m^2].

parameter.name: System Z Translation Variance
parameter.comment: Driving noise: system translation variance [m^2].

parameter.name: Mahalanobis Th
parameter.comment: Mahalanobis threshold for integrating motion estimates

parameter.name: CurrRoad
parameter.comment: CurrRoad

parameter.name: CurrRoad1
parameter.comment: CurrRoad1

parameter.name: CurrRoad2
parameter.comment: CurrRoad2

parameter.name: File Path
parameter.comment: Path to the file containing the vehicle data. It must be relative to the image data directory.

parameter.name: Ego-Motion Input String Id
parameter.comment: String identification of the ego-motion. Input must be a SRigidMotion object type.

parameter.name: Max Distance?
parameter.comment: Max distance to show poses [m]

parameter.name: Color Encoding Sections
parameter.comment: Number of sections for color encoding

parameter.name: Poses Overlay
parameter.comment: Poses Overlay
